structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Hot Lunch Program; Incorporation Into School Lunch Program

text.section: Each program shall solicit voluntary contributions for each meal furnished in accordance with the requirements of Title IIIB of the Older Americans Act of 1965, as amended.
The lunches served shall meet the nutritional standards established in accordance with Title III of the Older Americans Act of 1965, as amended.
The procedures determined by each designated school committee or independent school in serving such lunches shall be approved by the department of elder affairs.
